about_the_game:
SWAPMEAT is a co-op roguelite third-person shooter where you drop onto a series of increasingly challenging planets and engage in combat with the unfriendly locals, swapping body parts with the alien weirdos you defeat. Attach a wide swath of strange (and usually squishy) heads, legs and torsos to your Meat Scientist suit, gaining powerful abilities to change up your play style on the fly.

Loot defeated enemies for fresh meat to top off your HP and fine-tune your arsenal of abilities as you face down the next wave of weirdos.

SWAPMEAT has the deep and rewarding progression you’d expect from a great roguelite. Every time you make it back to the mothership with your meat parts intact, you can upgrade your weapons, your abilities, and even yourself.

Play solo if you’re in the mood for a single serving, or squad up with 1-4 coworkers, err, friends — SWAPMEAT’s tuned for co-op shootin’ and lootin’! With shared upgrades, strategic teamplay, and brutal boss fights, the chain’s only as strong as its weakest (sausage) link.

You’re a Meat Scientist for Rangus Meats, a multi-galactic corporation dedicated to discovering the ultimate sustainable meat product to feed the universe…at least that’s what you think…

This ain't your daddy's third-person action shooter with roguelite elements. In SWAPMEAT, a run doesn't truly end until you take down a gargantuan Beefy Boss, a planet-spanning encounter that challenges your entire team to work together, just like a raid boss in other genres.

  • Processor: Intel i5 7th generation or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 5670 / Nvidia GeForce 8800

Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Kernel 6
  • Processor: 3.00 Ghz Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 5670 / Nvidia GeForce 8800
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: SWAPMEAT is a co-op roguelite third-person shooter where you raid the weirdest worlds and angriest aliens in the universe...for their meat. Swap body parts with enemies you defeat to steal their abilities and augment your hero on the fly, and fight alongside your friends to bring home the bacon.
